page.title: 02GARDEN CENTRE,JORDANS.
page.content: David Wright is the owner of Harmonies Nursery in Twitchells Lane, Jordans.He is physically handicapped and uses an electric wheelchair for his work. The nursery was opened in December 1960.Previously it was a chicken farm. There are six greenhouses,fuelled by oil,on the half acre site.He grows mainly bedding plants;to sell to the public and to make hanging baskets. These include fuschia,cyclamen, geranium,begonia,spider plants and busy Lizzie. He also grows flowers to sell to florists,mainly chrysanthemums,dahlias and zinnia. David Wright has two helpers during the week but employs students at weekends and during the holidays.
